file_content.text: You don't have to do this! It's not rakghoul plague--it's just a little fever!
We have orders. It's nothing personal.
But you're wrong about me! You wouldn't kill an innocent man, right?
Never said I was--but that doesn't make me a rakghoul! Give me a little while to break this fever. You'll see.
You're lucky we're wearing bio-filters--but you so much as cough, and we open fire.
